item.title: How NOT to Set Up a Hyper-V Server Lab
item.description: Sorry for all the words. Skip to the end if you just want the punchline Have you ever had one of those weeks where you just bang your head against the same wall and eventually get some relief? Sometimes, your head breaks open, but other times, the wall breaks. Well I just had one of those weeks but I’m not sure how I feel about where this all ended up.
